title: Science Learning Design Based on Collective Experiences in the Digital Age

context.additional_context: Emphasizing smartphone-based collaborative activities to develop science problem-solving skills applicable to real-world workplace scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers using digital tools to collect, analyze, and share scientific experiment data
Learners can systematically document scientific problem-solving processes through group discussions and feedback activities
Learners can propose plans to apply scientific knowledge acquired during project execution to field operations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
